title: Love Island’s Rosie Williams is unrecognisable without makeup in stunning bare faced snap
text:
Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Love Island star Rosie Williams looked naturally beautiful in a make up free selfie on her Instagram .

The reality star, who appeared in the show last year, is known for her glamorous heavy makeup.

But in this photo Rosie, 28, looks as if she has just a touch of mascara and nude lipstick on, revealing her beautiful freckles.

She gazes into the camera with some of her long hair styled in a high ponytail and the rest flowing down her shoulders in beachy curls.

(Image: Instagram)

She captioned the photo: "...to those who made a comment yesterday - FRECK OFF!"

Rosie's caption referenced the cruel trolls who had criticised her freckles on a previous photo where they could be seen on her chest.

She also posted a photo of her holding hands with her boyfriend, Wayne Davies, 31, as they holiday in Mexico.

One follower wrote: "Oh noooo too much sun damage."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Another said: "Your hands look old".

But her latest snap attracted a lot of positive comments, including one that said: "Loooove the freckles".

Amber Gill from this years' Love Island responded with love heart eyes emojis, while Kady McDermott from 2016's series called Rosie an "angel".

(Image: Instagram)

Other comments said: "I LOVE your freckles!!!!" and "Omg yes to freckles AMAZING".

Rosie worked as a lawyer before she appeared on Love Island, where she was coupled up with Adam Collard until his disloyalty caused them to have a huge spat.

She is now dating entrepreneur Wayne, who she said she knew before she went into the villa.

(Image: Supplied by WENN)

(Image: ITV)

Wayne avoided jail earlier this year after causing death by careless driving, according to The Sun.

He admitted causing the death of navy recruit James Edwards, 22, in Manchester in 2017.

He also admitted to possessing class A drugs, and was given a 10-month suspended sentence and ordered to carry out 200 hours of community service.
description: Rosie looked completely different from her usually glamorous self in the selfie as she holidays with her new beau
